qas.question: Mutts, dogs that have several breed characteristics, live how much longer than purebred dogs?
Do bigger dogs typically have longer or shorter lives?
When was a study done that discovered mixed breeds tend to live longer than pure breeds?
Typically, how much longer do mixed breeds live?

context: In <a2_0>2013<a2_0/>, a study found that mixed breeds live on average <a0_0><a3_0>1.2 years<a0_0/> longer<a3_0/> than pure breeds, and that increasing body-weight was negatively correlated with longevity (i.e. the heavier the dog the <a1_0>shorter<a1_0/> its lifespan).
